name: Bunnescape
description:
A small platformer.

Yellow bunny has a mechanical arm and can use differente weapons and tools to help it on the biggest mission ever "THE BUNNESCAPE" have fun!

  • The bunny
    • The yellow bunny is just a bunny doing bunny things
  • The colores bunnies
    • They were all transformed on yellow bunnies
  • The villains
    • The worm is a bad bunny clonning experience
    • The green bunny is a robotic no-brain clonned bunny
    • The bunnacopter is annoying
    • The green machinery
    • Acid trap is a bad place to fall
    • DR. SQUAREHAND is an evil scientist, no one can see his face!
  • DR. SQUAREHAND is an evil scientist, no one can see his face!
  • Know the weapons/tools:
    • The Staff: can shoot 3 energy balls on the screen
    • Red Shield : deflects damage
    • The Carrot: can shoot 1 big energy ball on the screen
    • Separator Hammer: can shoot a bullet and divide it in two while pressing the shoot button again
  • The game was all made by myself:
    • Game was made using Game Maker Studio 2
    • Art all made on Aseprite
    • Music made on pixitracker
    • Audio made on the online app sfxr.me
    • Font a CC0 sprite font
